alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Garland; Perry; Pulaski; Saline; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 5:55PM CDT until June 25 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Perry County in central Arkansas... Southern Conway County in central Arkansas... Southwestern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Northern Garland County in central Arkansas... Saline County in central Arkansas... Central Yell County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 554 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Adona to near Ola, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... Conway... Benton... West Little Rock... Bryant... Hot Springs Village... Morrilton... Perryville... Shannon Hills... Ola... Oppelo... Menifee... Perry... Adona... Houston... Sequoya Park... Otter Creek... Little Italy... Roland in Pulaski County... Jessieville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Faulkner; Garland; Perry; Pulaski; Saline; Yell
